title: What are the challenges of uniting spiritual groups and traditions, and who are the individuals involved in this effort?
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of this extensive text, the author brings together various spiritual practices, including both orthodox and heretical tendencies, as well as monastic and lay organizations. Raimondo Lullo, who traveled to different regions for his unifying missionary work, is mentioned, along with Renè Guènon's criticism directed towards Valli's lack of proper "mentalité initiatique". These ideas bring clarity to the author's goal of unification within the "Chiesa d'Amore."
content: Niente bisogno di giungere al Pico, al Reuklin, al Kunrath; basta già allora, per tutti, Raimondo Lullo - cotesto infaticabile e immarcescibile atleta di tante e sì varie battaglie - il quale, proprio in quegli anni e per quella unione (9), percorreva e moveva terre e mari; ma non riusciva a smovere nè un papa nè un altro nè ancora un altro, sinchè, per il suo unicattolico sogno, trovava, ottantatreenne, lo sfidato e risfidato martirio. Tutte cose, mi pare, che definitivamente troncano la testa al toro, se pur qualche vèrtebra cervicale potesse ancora resistere, in cotesto sfiancatello toro della opposizione antivalliana. Sfiancato che non fosse, pessime ausiliarie sarebbero alla battaglia, certe iniziatiche recensioni come quella, fresca fresca, di Voile d'Isis. Nella quale, sùbito Renè Guènon riconosce al volume del Valli «une documentation formidable» (109), ma, non meno subito, al Valli rimprovera «de n'avoir pas la mentalitè initiatique qui convient » (110).
last_phrase: In conclusion, the tireless efforts of Raymond Lully - the indefatigable athlete of numerous and varied battles - to promote his unicatholic dream were not in vain. Despite his failure to move popes or opposition, he found martyrdom at the age of 83. Such historical and theological context puts an end to any argument against the antivallian opposition. Certain initiatory reviews, like Voile d'Isis, may offer extensive documentation, but fail to embody the necessary initiatory mentality. It is crucial to understand the true meanings of tradition and have a clear distinction between exoteric and esoteric perspectives.
